name: Shard (BjornStahl)
description:
Shard is a puzzle game made during Brackeys game jam 2020.2.

The object is to find and destroy all crystals in each level. You carry a crystal shard that can be launched to destroy crystals. By destroying crystals, your shard gains the ability to bounce, each destroyed crystal awards one bounce. You only have one shard, to reuse it it has to be recalled.
